评论概述: Really Nice Dress for the Price
评论详情: Ordering clothes online always feels like a gamble, but this was an excellent purchase! LOOK AT THE SIZE CHART - I normally wear a 16 or 18 depending on fabric and cut, but I ordered a 26 here based on the measurements listed and it fits perfectly. Definitely make sure you're going based on the measurements in the chart and not your usual size. It doesn't look cheap and there aren't random seam tears or loose threads. It wasn't even creased weirdly like clothes sometimes are after shipping. Best of all, it didn't smell like chemicals or dyes like so many clothes bought online do. I would definitely buy again from this company.

We had it hemmed since she is only 5'2".  It doesn't look cheap.  It was super comfortable.  My only recommendation would be to buy an additional slip if it's a daytime wedding; it is a bit sheer.
